from event_manager import *
import sys
import uselect
from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
import music
from machine import Pin, SoftI2C
from aiot_dht20 import DHT20
from aiot_lcd1602 import LCD1602
from machine import RTC
from wifi import __wifi__
import ntptime
import time
from aiot_rgbled import RGBLed

event_manager.reset()

def read_terminal_input():
  spoll=uselect.poll()        # Set up an input polling object.
  spoll.register(sys.stdin, uselect.POLLIN)    # Register polling object.

  input = ''
  if spoll.poll(0):
    input = sys.stdin.read(1)

    while spoll.poll(0):
      input = input + sys.stdin.read(1)

  spoll.unregister(sys.stdin)
  return input

def on_event_timer_callback_y_w_a_N_x():
  global cmd, Temperature, warning, Humidity, Luminosity, humid_min, temp_max, security
  cmd = read_terminal_input()
  if cmd == '1':
    pin4.servo_write(0, max=270)
  elif cmd == '2':
    pin4.servo_write(180, max=270)
  if cmd == '3':
    display.set_all('#ff0000')
  elif cmd == '4':
    display.set_all('#000000')
  if cmd == '5':
    pin10.write_analog(round(translate(33, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  elif cmd == '6':
    pin10.write_analog(round(translate(66, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  if cmd == '7':
    pin10.write_analog(round(translate(100, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  elif cmd == '8':
    pin10.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  if cmd == '9':
    pin14.write_analog(round(translate(50, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  elif cmd == '10':
    pin14.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  if len(cmd) == 7:
    temp_max = int(cmd)
    if temp_max < Temperature:
      music.play(['G3:1'], wait=True)
    print(temp_max, end =' ')
  elif len(cmd) == 9:
    humid_min = int(cmd)
    if humid_min > Humidity:
      music.play(['A3:1'], wait=True)
    print(humid_min, end =' ')
  cmd = 0

event_manager.add_timer_event(200, on_event_timer_callback_y_w_a_N_x)

aiot_dht20 = DHT20(SoftI2C(scl=Pin(22), sda=Pin(21)))

aiot_lcd1602 = LCD1602()

def on_event_timer_callback_J_t_P_O_l():
  global cmd, Temperature, warning, Humidity, Luminosity, humid_min, temp_max, security
  aiot_dht20.read_dht20()
  Temperature = aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()
  Humidity = aiot_dht20.dht20_humidity()
  Luminosity = round(translate((pin0.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(Temperature)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(4, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('*C')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(6, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(' ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(7, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(Humidity)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(11, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('%')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(12, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(' ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(13, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(' ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(14, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(' ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(15, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(' ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[4])))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(2, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(':')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(3, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[5])))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(5, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(':')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(6, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[6])))

event_manager.add_timer_event(1000, on_event_timer_callback_J_t_P_O_l)

tiny_rgb = RGBLed(pin1.pin, 4)

def on_event_timer_callback_c_E_X_m_G():
  global cmd, Temperature, warning, Humidity, Luminosity, humid_min, temp_max, security
  print((''.join([str(x) for x in ['!1:T:', Temperature, '#', '!1:H:', Humidity, '#', '!1:L:', Luminosity, '#']])), end =' ')

event_manager.add_timer_event(30000, on_event_timer_callback_c_E_X_m_G)

def on_button_a_pressed():
  global cmd, Temperature, warning, Humidity, Luminosity, humid_min, temp_max, security
  if Temperature > temp_max:
    aiot_lcd1602.clear()
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Weather:  Hot')
    pin10.write_analog(round(translate(33, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
    time.sleep_ms(5000)
    pin10.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  else:
    aiot_lcd1602.clear()
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Weather: Good')
    pin10.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
    time.sleep_ms(2000)

button_a.on_pressed = on_button_a_pressed

def on_button_b_pressed():
  global cmd, Temperature, warning, Humidity, Luminosity, humid_min, temp_max, security
  if Humidity < humid_min:
    aiot_lcd1602.clear()
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Humidity: Not Good')
    pin14.write_analog(round(translate(50, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
    time.sleep_ms(5000)
    pin14.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  else:
    aiot_lcd1602.clear()
    aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
    aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Humidity: Good')
    pin14.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
    time.sleep_ms(2000)

button_b.on_pressed = on_button_b_pressed

if True:
  __wifi__.connect_wifi('Redmi Note 10S', '123456789')
  ntptime.settime()
  (year, month, mday, week_of_year, hour, minute, second, milisecond) = RTC().datetime()
  RTC().init((year, month, mday, week_of_year, hour+7, minute, second, milisecond))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(5, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Hello')
  tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#000000'))
  display.scroll('AIOT')
  aiot_lcd1602.clear()
  temp_max = 0
  humid_min = 0
  Temperature = 0
  Humidity = 0
  Luminosity = 0

while True:
  event_manager.run()
  time.sleep_ms(1000)
